Out of range alert keeps you in control. Multiple remote boats can race together with no interference — great for family or friends' competition.

Waterproof RC Boat with Self-Righting & Demo Mode:Double-sealing ring waterproof design keeps your rc boat safe and dry! Flipped over? No worries!
